alldb.table_sql: select * from ( select distinct ci.id, ci.contract_id, ci.contract_number, ci1.id cust_number,ci1.CUST_NAME,CI.CUST_DEALER from contract_info ci left outer join cust_info ci1 on ci.CUST_ID=ci1.id where ci.contract_status not in ('201','111') ) rs where 1=1 /~cust_number: and rs.cust_number='{cust_number}'~/ /~contract_number: and rs.contract_number like '%{contract_number}%'~/ /~dealer_id: and rs.cust_dealer = '{dealer_id}'~/
